original_title: 押しに弱くてイヤだと言えない制服少女とエロ整体師 夕美しおん
overview: Shion, who belongs to the badminton club, visits a well-reputed sports chiropractor in her neighborhood for treatment of her injured leg during practice. The doctor's eyes are somewhat irritating for her first treatment at the clinic, and she naturally touches her breasts and buttocks in the middle of her massage. Shion, who has a gentle personality, can't resist, and her erotic manipulative treatment gradually escalates. The sexual feeling of a young body is in estrus to the stimulation of the massage that gently blames her pubic area. A girl who has been poisoned by a physiotherapist can no longer escape!
title: A Young Girl In Uniform Who Can’t Say No, And A Pervy Massage Therapist – Shion Yumi
